instructions: Boil paruppu, a ball of tamarind in water along with it
Add oil, veggies, mustard seeds, fenugreek, after splutter, add veggies, add flavor powders to coat, add water, bring to a boil, wait until veggies are cooked
Add tamarind water, bring to a boil
Add parupu, bring to a boil, adjust consistency, flavor powders, salt
